comments:
Hi,

I have sucessfully use the VCE on SuSE 9 (under KDE) with the 2.4 kernel.
However if I try to use it on SuSE9.1 with the 2.6 kernel then the introspection
of the bean class fails. Here is an extract from the .log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.configurator Sep 26, 2004 13:29:25.384

+++ Warning +++: Wed Oct 13 17:43:49 BST 2004    Project (MyJavaProject)-Be

This is a known problem with SUSE. You need to go to the etc/.hosts file and go
to the line:

::1    localhost localhost-ipv6 ...

and remove the localhost tag of it. Leave the rest of the line there and do not
change the line that says:

127.0.0.1    localhost

traces.message: Connection refused  !ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.proxy 2 0 Oct 13, 2004 10:33:02.845 !MESSAGE  +++ Warning +++: Wed Oct 13 10:33:02 BST 2004    Project (MyJavaProject)-Beaninfo:err>  !ENTRY org.eclipse.jem.proxy 2 0 Oct 13, 2004 10:33:02.847 !MESSAGE  +++ Warning +++: Wed Oct 13 10:33:02 BST 2004    Project (MyJavaProject)-Beaninfo:err>
